physical_appearance:This is a pictorial of two individuals who are tidying a large fishing net. They both don a conical hat
 long-sleeved tops and a cloth garment worn around the waist. The print has an overall yellowish tint; a sign of discoloration.

sgcool_label_text:Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This photograph was part of a set of 12 prints sent to the Royal Photographic Society in 1956.
